properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 19 at 9:08PM PST until January 20 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Seas around 9 feet 13 seconds tonight through Monday
afternoon. South winds increasing Monday evening and overnight,
reaching 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt, with seas building
to 12 to 15 feet 10 seconds.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the first Small Craft Advisory, until 3 AM PST
Monday. For the second Small Craft Advisory, from 3 PM to 9 PM
PST Monday. For the Gale Warning, from 9 PM Monday to 8 AM PST
Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An additional very large swell will also
arrive Tuesday, after Gale Force Winds subside.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST MONDAY... ...ADDITIONAL SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TO 9 PM PST MONDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM MONDAY TO 8 AM PST TUESDAY
